channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: USDA Sec. threatens funding cuts to blue states over alleged SNAP data noncompliance
item.description: The Trump administration threatened to cut off federal funding to blue states over their alleged refusal to share SNAP program data.

item.title: Appeals court disqualifies Trump's NJ prosecutor pick Alina Habba, rejecting DOJ challenge
item.description: The ruling affirming Habba's disqualification came one week after another Trump-picked prosecutor, Lindsey Halligan, was deemed invalidly appointed.

item.title: Who qualifies for the ‘Trump accounts’ for kids?
Sabrina Carpenter blasts Trump admin for 'evil' ICE video that uses her song 'Juno'
item.description: Carpenter joins Beyoncé, Olivia Rodrigo, and others in demanding that President Trump and his administration not use their songs to promote policies.

item.title: Costco sues Trump admin seeking tariff refunds before Supreme Court rules if they're illegal
item.description: Costco joined dozens of other companies that are seeking to protect their rights to refunds of Trump's tariffs without first waiting for the Supreme C...

item.title: Watch: Trump holds Cabinet meeting as Hegseth boat strike scrutiny mounts
item.description: Scrutiny over the boat strikes, government shutdown, ACA tax credits, Jeffrey Epstein and more has dominated the news since Trump's last Cabinet meeti...

item.title: A value-oriented fund manager’s 17 dividend-paying stock-market bargains
How Tesla managed a sales gain in the all-important China market
Dow up over 200 points in final hour as stocks rebound, bitcoin climbs — live
How the next Fed chair could turn bonds into a far riskier investment
